revised_title: Further Experiments on the Production of Helium from Radium: Quantitative Relations between Radium and its Products
tldr: The authors investigate the production of helium from radium and the relationship between radium and its products. They develop a method to measure the volume of emanation and helium produced from a known weight of radium bromide and find that the emanation from thorium is chemically inert, similar to the members of the argon family.
